methods.name: _isOptionChecked
methods.description:
Returns true if the color passed as argument is currently
checked.

methods.name: _colorOption
methods.description: Returns a ColorOption component for a given color

methods.name: _colorOptions
methods.description: Returns ColorOption components for all available colors.

availableColors.description: An array of color choices to display.

name.description: The name to apply to the input.

onChange.description: A callback triggered when a color is selected.
